issue.title: add signal whenever sim time is updated

content.raw: Another aspect to keep in mind is the Reset button on the time control panel which causes [World::ResetTime](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/b0ba09e25d3c66e07d267d66e1a0b7ebe215beb4/gazebo/physics/World.cc?at=default#cl-713) to be invoked. This button resets sim time to zero without sending any signals to downstream controllers. If we want to support ResetTime functionality, we would need the sim time update signal to handle time resets. Alternatively we could disable the Reset button on the time control panel.
content.html: Another aspect to keep in mind is the Reset button on the time control panel which causes World::ResetTime to be invoked. This button resets sim time to zero without sending any signals to downstream controllers. If we want to support ResetTime functionality, we would need the sim time update signal to handle time resets. Alternatively we could disable the Reset button on the time control panel.
